name: window(_:willResizeForVersionBrowserWithMaxPreferredSize:maxAllowedSize:)
desc: Tells the delegate the window will resize for presentation during version browsing.
declaration:
optional func window(_ window: NSWindow, 
willResizeForVersionBrowserWithMaxPreferredSize maxPreferredFrameSize: NSSize, 
      maxAllowedSize maxAllowedFrameSize: NSSize) -> NSSize
